languages.text: "Не думаю, что лезть в эксперимент гемункула — хорошая идея. Лучше мы его уничтожим".

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю, что лезть в эксперимент гемункула — хорошая идея. Лучше мы его уничтожим".

languages.text: "Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что лезть в эксперимент гемункула — хорошая идея. Лучше мы его уничтожим".

traits.locale_text: "Tampering with a Haemonculos's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."
"Tampering with a Haemonculos's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."
"Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."
"Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."
"Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."

languages.text: «No me parece buena idea trastear con un experimento del hemónculo. Sería mejor destruirlo».
languages.original_text: "Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."

traits.locale_text: «No me parece buena idea trastear con un experimento del hemónculo. Sería mejor destruirlo».

languages.text: 「ハモンキュラスの実験に手を加えるのはいい考えとは思えない。むしろ破壊すべきだ」
languages.original_text: "Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."

traits.locale_text: 「ハモンキュラスの実験に手を加えるのはいい考えとは思えない。むしろ破壊すべきだ」

languages.text: “乱碰血伶人的机器恐怕不是什么好主意，我们应该把它摧毁。”
languages.original_text: "Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."

traits.locale_text: “乱碰血伶人的机器恐怕不是什么好主意，我们应该把它摧毁。”

languages.text: « Je ne pense pas qu'il soit particulièrement avisé de trafiquer l'expérience d'un hémoncule. Nous devrions plutôt la détruire. »
languages.original_text: "Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne pense pas qu'il soit particulièrement avisé de trafiquer l'expérience d'un hémoncule. Nous devrions plutôt la détruire. »

languages.text: "Ich halte es für keine gute Idee, uns hier am Experiment eines Haemonculus zu schaffen zu machen. Wir sollten es besser komplett zerstören."
languages.original_text: "Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."

traits.locale_text: "Ich halte es für keine gute Idee, uns hier am Experiment eines Haemonculus zu schaffen zu machen. Wir sollten es besser komplett zerstören."

languages.text: "Haimonkulus'un deneylerinden birini kurcalamak, bana pek iyi bir fikir gibi gelmedi. Bunun yerine yok edelim gitsin."
languages.original_text: "Tampering with a Haemonculus's experiment does not strike me as a good idea. We should destroy it instead."

traits.locale_text: "Haimonkulus'un deneylerinden birini kurcalamak, bana pek iyi bir fikir gibi gelmedi. Bunun yerine yok edelim gitsin."
